title: Vegetarian Nut Burgers
ingredients: ['175ml (6 fl oz) water', '150g (5 oz) bulgur wheat', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '175g (6 oz) cashew nuts', '100g (4 oz) unsalted sunflower seeds', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 dash hot pepper sauce, such as Tabasco']
